entry.title: BIP Number Request: Open Asset
entry.summary: On May 26, 2016, Luke Dashjr reached out to the Bitcoin-dev mailing list to inquire about the status of a BIP proposed by Flavien Charlon. Nicolas Dorier had previously mentioned the author and asked if it would be assigned. Peter Todd's signature was included in the email, which was attached as a non-text file. No further information was provided regarding the content of the BIP or its potential impact on the Bitcoin community.
